title: Privacy and Big Data.epub
description: Much of what constitutes Big Data is information about us. Through our online activities, we leave an easy-to-follow trail of digital footprints that reveal who we are, what we buy, where we go, and much more. This eye-opening book explores the raging privacy debate over the use of personal data, with one undeniable conclusion: our data is the hottest commodity on the market todaytruly more valuable than gold.
